name: alamo
description: High level full streaming API s3 client with multipart upload and concurrent uploads, and automatic retries with exponential backoff
author: Jerome Touffe-Blin <jtblin@gmail.com> (http://about.me/jtblin)

scripts.release: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm run check && npm run major && npm run release
scripts.release-minor: npm run check && npm run minor && npm run release
scripts.release-patch: npm run check && npm run patch && npm run release
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover _mocha -- -R list && istanbul report cobertura && node test/support/badge.js
